Hi!

Did anybody tried to embedd Heritrix to another software? I followed to 
message1276 <http://groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/1276> 
from the FAQ, but the attached SimpleHreitrixLauncher.java wasn't 
stored. I'm just trying to make Heritrix for some time from my app. 
There's a snippet from my source:

CrawlJobHandler admin = new CrawlJobHandler(new File(jobsDirPath));

CrawlJob jobTemp = admin.getJob("20060222120757781");

CrawlJob newJob = admin.newJob(jobTemp,null,jobName,description, seeds, 0);

admin.addJob(newJob);
admin.startCrawler();
Thread.sleep(90 * 1000);

admin.stopCrawler();
admin.deleteJob(admin.getCurrentJob().getUID());
admin = null;

The process gets stuck on Processor Chain init with exception 
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError. Here's the trace:

23.02.2006 20:04:59 org.archive.crawler.framework.ProcessorChain <init>
INFO: Processor: FrontierScheduler --> 
org.archive.crawler.postprocessor.FrontierScheduler
Exception in thread "StartNextJob" java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpState.setCookiesMap(Ljava/util/SortedMap;)V
    at 
org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchHTTP.configureHttpCookies(FetchHTTP.java:1049)
    at 
org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchHTTP.configureHttp(FetchHTTP.java:1005)
    at 
org.archive.crawler.fetcher.FetchHTTP.initialTasks(FetchHTTP.java:952)
    at 
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.runProcessorInitialTasks(CrawlController.java:1672)
    at 
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.requestCrawlStart(CrawlController.java:1007)
    at 
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler.startNextJobInternal(CrawlJobHandler.java:1137)
    at 
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler$3.run(CrawlJobHandler.java:1114)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)

All the libs are on classpath. And i use JDK 1.5.0_03. May the problem 
be in it?
